entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
